turns.speaker: participant2

They're both delicious and give you a real taste of our local cuisine. Would you like directions to the market?

turns.speaker: participant2
turns.utterance: To get to the market, take the main road straight down from the Old Town entrance, and you'll see it on your right after about five minutes. At the market, make sure to try the artisan cheeses and the homemade jams. They're unique to our region and a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Anything else you'd like to know?
